amendment.description: To provide enhanced protection against debt collector harassment of members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Amendment SA 199 under the order of 7/20/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 198.
Amendment SA 199 proposed by Senator Warnock to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3570-3571) To provide enhanced protection against debt collector harassment of members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 199 proposed by Senator Warnock to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 199 under the order of 7/20/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 198.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 199 under the order of 7/20/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 198.
